column2: Grubb and Burrowes''' was a notary firm in [[the Shire]] led by two [[Grubb]]s and one [[Burrowes]]. They were probably lawyers or auctioneers.<ref>{{HM|Guide}}
Grubb and Burrowes oversaw the auction of [[Bilbo Baggins]]' estate after the hobbit went missing in {{SR|1341}}.<ref>{{H|Return}}</ref>

column1: '''2014: ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'':'''
:[[Tosser Grubb]] leads the auction on behalf of the firm.
